title: MGU Kerala Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Security Staff Post
description: Mahatma Gandhi University, Kerala (MGU Kerala) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Security Staff Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass can grab this chance and apply for the MGU Kerala Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. For...
